O CS:GO tem melhorado muito ao longo dos anos, continua a ser um jogo muito viciante e altamente competitivo, no entanto, apesar das melhorias, o sistema anti cheat continua à quem da expectativa. Apesar do sistema VAC ser um dos melhores sistemas anti batota existentes, precisa ainda de alguns ajustes. Penso que o jogo deveria ser pago assim evitava que o batoteiro possa adquirir o jogo gratuitamente após a conta comprometida levar ban. Existem outros sistemas anti cheat que a meu ver obtém melhores resultados, imediatos.

Hile falan çokta gene dön dolay buraya geliyorsun.
Aynen kardeşim Cs öldü

The game turned out to be a worthy continuation of the series. CS: GO took the best from its "parents".
Unlike the previous parts, CS: GO is full of new things that I will still list.
- Competitive game. It's like a mix. Only now there is no need to search for the server, and it is much more convenient to play.
- Skins. Yes, for some it is also a problem. Previously, they were used for beauty, but now they earn money by trading and betting. Bets are a separate topic, some matches are deliberately fooled, only it was canceled so that DDOser does not lose his items.

I really liked the game, despite the fact that every day there are more cheaters and boosters. However, Valve is trying to fix the problems, but it is not known whether they will succeed or not. In general, summing up, the game gets a score of 10 out of 10.
